ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I don t even have 2k and I m lvl 54. I hardly ever get to loot bc of my connection speed. People always beat me to the corpses. So I m lucky if I make
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I don't even have 2k and I'm lvl 54. I hardly ever get to loot bc of
my connection speed. People always beat me to the corpses. So I'm lucky if I
make 10p in several hours of camping. I think I made about 50p camping in
SolA for 26 hours. I'm generally busy healing or medding so the tanks
usually get the loot anyways. Plus I'm not that aggressive about loot.
luv,
-Su

> On one good evening of exp you can make 100k. (if you are lucky). On one
> normal evening of exp you should make at least 500-1kpp if you choose that
> type of spot (4h or so of playing).
>
> You really think 5k is expensive?
>
> Hokay.
>
